description.author:
Mistral Contrastin,
Matthew Danish,
Dominic Orchard,
Andrew Rice
description.synopsis: Parsers and analyses for Fortran standards 66, 77, 90, 95 and 2003 (partial).
description.description: Provides lexing, parsing, and basic analyses of Fortran code covering standards: FORTRAN 66, FORTRAN 77, Fortran 90, Fortran 95, Fortran 2003 (partial) and some legacy extensions. Includes data flow and basic block analysis, a renamer, and type analysis. For example usage, see the @<https://hackage.haskell.org/package/camfort CamFort>@ project, which uses fortran-src as its front end.
